# Web scraping  on the website which Kayleah provided. 

(website)[https://www.dataanalyst.com/]



```{r}
library(rvest)

url <- 'https://www.dataanalyst.com'

html <- read_html(url)

divs <- html %>%
  html_nodes("div.job-board-wrapper")

divs_text <- divs %>%
  html_text()

divs_text
```


```{r}
# Create empty data frame with column names
job_data <- data.frame(job_title = character(),
                       company_name = character(),
                       country = character(),
                       location = character(),
                       workplace = character(),
                       experience = character(),
                       salary = character(),
                       industry = character(),
                       published_date = character(),
                       stringsAsFactors = FALSE)

```
